entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
